titles.title: To provide for the tax treatment of income and transactions relating to the Catawba Indian Tribe of South Carolina Land Claims Settlement Act of 1993.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1638-1639)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/3/1994--Introduced. Amends the Catawba Indian Tribe of South Carolina Land Claims Settlement Act of 1993 to provide for the tax treatment of: (1) private funds received as part of the settlement; (2) land conveyances; (3) per capita payments; (4) income from the sale of artifacts; and (5) estate taxes.
